scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:watch: npm run watch-client && npm run watch-server
scripts.init: npm install && cd ./server-side && npm install && cd .. && cd ./client-side && npm install && cd ..
scripts.client:addon: cd client-side && ng serve --port 4400 --configuration SingleSpa && cd..
scripts.client:standalone: cd client-side && ng serve --port 4400 --configuration Standalone && cd..
